fields.name: Best Weapon(s):
fields.value:
__Primordial Jade Cutter__ 
With it's high CRIT Rate substat, this weapon is the best offensive option for C6 Xingqiu, as long as ER requirements are met. Not recommended for non-C6 Xingqiu.

__Favonius Sword__ 
This weapon has a very high Energy Recharge substat at 61.3%, it also sports the benefit of being able to battery your entire team, and is a powerful option even at refinement level 1.

__R3+ Sacrificial Sword__ This weapon has the same high Energy Recharge substat as Favonius Sword, but it's passive skill lowers Xingqiu's energy needs and is better for his personal damage. However this weapon does have the drawback of desynching rotations since Xingqiu has a very long skill cooldown at 21s.

fields.name: Replacement Weapon(s):
fields.value:
Mistsplitter Reforged, Amenoma Kageuchi, Light of Foliar Incision

__Wolf Fang__
A Battle Pass weapon, but with enough Energy Recharge or C6, it is his best in slot 4*.
